author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

While investigating https://ggus.eu/index.php?mode=ticket_info&ticket_id=160073 I realized we didn't have a test for the cross-site catalog access (that is used in the wild at least for specifying the xrootd fallback). This PR adds such a test.

#### PR validation:

Unit test succeeds.
title: Add test for cross-site catalog access
